review: This is an upgrade from the original Fire TV. It works very well, and is compact. Further, it plugs into the HDMI port, thus saving a lot of hassles. I have tried Netflix and it works very well. I had a Samsung blue dvd player which can also perform many functions like this one, but it does not have Amazon prime built in (it was an older model with many streaming channels missing). So must say I am very happy about it.My Fire TV broke down just after one year.  I hope this one will last.
